verses.roman:
ghare vasi' kare prabhu nāma saṅkīrtana
advaita āsiyā kare prabhura pūjana

synonyms: ghare vasi'-sitting in His room; kare—performs; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; nāma saṅkīrtana—chanting on beads; advaita—Advaita Ācārya; āsiyā—coming; kare—performs; prabhura pūjana—worship of the Lord.
translation: Sitting in His room, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu would chant on His beads, and Advaita Prabhu would come there to worship the Lord.
